column3: ma sukwadwom do wɔ Israel mbapɔmba ho
column6: Mbrɛ wo na si yɛ gyataber: wɔ ngyatanyin ntamu a! Ɔnyɛn ne mba wɔ ngyatafɔr mu."

column2: "Na ɔnyɛɛn ne mba no mu kor; ɔbɛyɛɛ gyatafɔr: na osuasuaa ahayɛ
"Amanaman so tsee ne nka; wɔkyeer no wɔ hɔn amona mu: na wɔdze nkwaba twee no kɔr Egypt asaase do."
"Afei ber a ohun dɛ ɔatweɔn atweɔn
column4: nna ɔfaa ne mba no mu baako so

column3: na ɔbɛyɛɛ gyatafɔr: na osuasuaa ahayɛ

column2: "Na ɔmaa hɔn ekunafo yɛ pii; na ɔbobɔɔ hɔn nkurow
column4: nye dza ɔwɔ mu nyina ho boow hɔn
column5: osian no pɔw ne dede ntsi."

column2: "Nna amanaman no fi amantɔw no mu kae kuae botwae yeer no mbea nyinara: na wɔdze hɔn boa tserɛɛw hɔn do; wɔkyeer no wɔ hɔn mona no mu."
"Na wɔdze nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn too no na wɔdze no too buw mu
column3: na wɔdze no kɛmaa Babilɔnhen; wɔdze no kɔtoo aban dzendzen mu
column4: amma wɔaanntse ne ndze bio wɔ Israel mbepɔw do."

column3: wɔ wo bɔgyaa no a wɔtsɛɛw no esu ho: no nsowee na n'abaw yeyɛɛ yie wɔ esu pii no ntsi."

column2: "Na onyaa mbaa dzendzen dze yɛɛ nhempoma maa hɔn a wodzi mpanyin
column3: na hɔn tsentsen kɔree kodur nkorbata kusuww no mu
column4: na wohun no no krɔn mu
na boka mframa no kyenkyeen no no nsowee no poe: ne mbaa dzendzen no bubui na ɔkyenkyenee: gya no hyeew no."

column2: "Na afei wɔatsɛw no wɔ sar do
column3: wɔ asaase kɛsɛɛ a nsu nnyi do no do."

column4: ma abaa a ɔyɛ dzen a wɔdze yɛ ahempoma a wɔdze dzi panyin nnyi no mu hɔ bio. Osukwadwom nye yi
